title: School-based nutritional programs reduce student obesity

title_detail.value: School-based nutritional programs reduce student obesity

summary: In-school nutrition policies and programs that promote healthier eating habits among middle school students limit increases in body mass index (BMI), a new study finds.

summary_detail.value: In-school nutrition policies and programs that promote healthier eating habits among middle school students limit increases in body mass index (BMI), a new study finds.
